divs: Sighting DetailsI saw yellow triangle in the night sky. I waked up because it was too much light. I called my mom and sister. We watched this show is about 20 mins. It had 8 lights from triangle to different sides. and suddenly missed in the sky. I thought i heard strange sounds. I cant explain it, but it was scaring. I felt something inside of me what takes me run away.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Puerto Maldonado
There were no other sightings in Puerto Maldonado on or around May 21st 2011
